mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PATIENT (PATIENT_ID, PATIENT_NAME, PATIENT_GENDER, PATIENT_RESIDENT_NUMBER, PATIENT_AGE, EMPLOYEE_NUM) VALUES (#{patientId}, #{patientName}, #{patientGender}, #{patientResidentNumber}, #{patientAge}, #{employeeNum})
mapper.select: SELECT C.NEXT_VISIT_DATE, P.PATIENT_ID, P.PATIENT_NAME, P.PATIENT_GENDER, P.PATIENT_AGE, P.EMPLOYEE_NUM, C.DISEASE FROM PATIENT P LEFT JOIN CHART C ON C.PATIENT_ID = P.PATIENT_ID WHERE C.NEXT_VISIT_DATE = #{nextVisitDate}
